public abstract class DirectRule extends Rule
DirectRule is an abstract class representing a direct rule for transitions in a puzzle. It provides methods for checking whether transitions and specific puzzle elements follow the rule.

    • checkRuleRaw

      public String checkRuleRaw(TreeTransition transition)
      Checks whether the TreeTransition logically follows from the parent node using this rule. This method is the one that should overridden in child classes.
      Specified by:
      checkRuleRaw in class Rule
      Parameters:
      transition - transition to check
      Returns:
      null if the child node logically follow from the parent node, otherwise error message

    • getDefaultBoard

      public abstract Board getDefaultBoard(TreeNode node)
      Creates a transition Board that has this rule applied to it using the TreeNode.
      Parameters:
      node - tree node used to create default transition board
      Returns:
      default board or null if this rule cannot be applied to this tree node
